idea: Taking a brand to great heights is a dream that most companies aspire to achieve, a dream made possible with the help of a digital marketing agency. However, the search for a digital marketing company in Mumbai that helps you achieve that goal can be a daunting task in itself. Luckily, your struggles can now come to an end! At Insomniacs, we pride ourselves on being one of the best online marketing companies present out there who has what it takes to turn your brand into a rockstar.

idea:
We are a startup that provide Engineering Design, Validation, Verification & Environmental Certification Consultation Services. Our idea of startup was to provide a international class services to various MNC & Indian IT / Banking corporates who opted for international consultants as part of their Indian Setup which deprived opportunity & exposure for Indian companies. 


Our Services Include:

1. MEP Design & Peer Review

2. MEP Third Party Testing & Commissioning Services

3. Green Building Certifications

4. Allied Services


Our Idea also got great traction with many of MNC's & Corporates trusting our skills & providing opportunity to work on their project setups. 


We now plan to consolidate & expand our setup for catering more clients & wider geographies & hence looking forward for a support form Indian Government on the same.
name: BERATUNG CONSULTANTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

Focused on building innovative delivery solutions using technology to create a positive impact.

We make the whole process simple, safe, and convenient while saving you time.
